text: Sabrina the Teenage Witch is an American teen television sitcom. It is based on the Archie comic book series of the same name. It is set in Massachusetts. It stars Melissa Joan Hart in the title role. Its first four seasons aired on Nickelodeon from September 27, 1996 to May 5, 2000; the final three seasons ran on Noggin from September 22, 2000 to April 24, 2003. == Other websites == * Category:1996 American television series debuts Category:2003 American television series endings Category:1990s American sitcoms Category:1990s teen television series Category:2000s American sitcoms Category:2000s teen television series Category:American teen comedy television series Category:College television series Category:High school television series Category:Television series set in Massachusetts Category:WB network shows Category:Nickelodeon television series Category:English-language television programs
title: Sabrina, the Teenage Witch (TV series)
